EmailTemplate.name: CS Update Report
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Daily BlueWave Community Solar Update
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{PARTNER_NAME}},
Your daily BlueWave Community Solar Update Report is here!
Attached you will find an Excel Workbook containing all the information you need about the community solar applicants you've submitted so far. If you have questions about these applicants, please contact BlueWave Partner Support at partnersupport@bluewavesolar.com or 888.997.2432.
Thanks for partnering with us to revolutionize energy.
- All of us here at BlueWave
BlueWave Partner Support 888.997.2432 | partnersupport@bluewavesolar.com
